structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ISSUANCE OF BONDS AND CONTROL OF FUNDS

law.history: Repealed 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 280, sec. 30, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 244, sec. 2, effective April 5, 1994. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3010-10, 3071, 3078 to 3080, 3195, 3284, 3646, 3679.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: City's power to issue bonds to fund floating debt or to refund outstanding bonds.
